item.title: Home Agency
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[columnsection wrapper="wrapper-small"][col size="one-full" last="last-col"]

A digital studio crafting beautiful & engaging online experiences

[spacer size="mini"] [sr-subtitle size="h5" alignment="center"]Praesent augue arcu, ornare ut tincidunt eu, mattis a libero. Pellentesque habitant morbi tristique senectus et netus et malesuada fames ac turpis egestas.[/sr-subtitle] [spacer size="mini"]

[button color=sr-button1 size="small-button" page="28"]Learn More[/button]

item.title: Brücke Bier
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[wolf wrapper="wrapper" parallax="true" captionparallax="true" randomhorizontaloffset="false" mouseparallax="false"][wolfitem size="wfull" speed="1.4" image="http://www.spab-rice.com/wordpress/demo/avoc-demo/wp-content/uploads/2015/07/600x400-light.jpg" imagelink="false" url="" captionshow="true" imageposition="wright" customcaptionwidth="60%" customimagewidth="" captionposition="overlay"] [sr-subtitle size="h5" alignment="auto"]Branding[/sr-subtitle]

The Efimer

[/wolfitem][/wolf][columnsection wrapper="wrapper-mini"][col size="one-full" last="last-col"]
Idea
Efimer is a project based on the concept that fashion is ephemeral. To represent this idea I designed a haute couture collection made by vegetables, which are ephemeral too. I decided to paint the vegetables to give uniformity at the clothes and express the purity that provides the white color.
Awards

item.title: The Efimer
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[wolf wrapper="wrapper" parallax="true" captionparallax="true" randomhorizontaloffset="false" mouseparallax="false"][wolfitem size="wfull" speed="1.4" image="http://www.spab-rice.com/wordpress/demo/avoc-demo/wp-content/uploads/2015/07/600x400-light.jpg" imagelink="false" url="" captionshow="true" imageposition="wright" customcaptionwidth="60%" customimagewidth="" captionposition="overlay"] [sr-subtitle size="h5" alignment="auto"]Branding[/sr-subtitle]

The Efimer

[/wolfitem][/wolf][columnsection wrapper="wrapper-mini"][col size="one-full" last="last-col"]
Idea
Efimer is a project based on the concept that fashion is ephemeral. To represent this idea I designed a haute couture collection made by vegetables, which are ephemeral too. I decided to paint the vegetables to give uniformity at the clothes and express the purity that provides the white color.
Awards
awwwards - Special Mention csswinner - Winner of the Day cssreel - Winner of the Day
Art Direction
Anna Salvador annasalavdor.com [/col][/columnsection][spacer size="big"][columnsection wrapper="wrapper"][col size="one-full" last="last-col"][sr-gallery images="image~~10~~http://www.spab-rice.com/wordpress/demo/avoc-demo/wp-content/uploads/2015/07/600x400-light-150x150.jpg|||image~~10~~http://www.spab-rice.com/wordpress/demo/avoc-demo/wp-content/uploads/2015/07/600x400-light-150x150.jpg" type="gallery" columns="2" animation="delayed" tilesize="300" spaced="yes" lightbox="no"][sr-gallery images="image~~14~~http://www.spab-rice.com/wordpress/demo/avoc-demo/wp-content/uploads/2015/07/1100x600-light-150x150.jpg" type="gallery" columns="1" animation="delayed" tilesize="300" spaced="yes" lightbox="no"][sr-gallery images="image~~10~~http://www.spab-rice.com/wordpress/demo/avoc-demo/wp-content/uploads/2015/07/600x400-light-150x150.jpg|||image~~10~~http://www.spab-rice.com/wordpress/demo/avoc-demo/wp-content/uploads/2015/07/600x400-light-150x150.jpg" type="gallery" columns="2" animation="delayed" tilesize="300" spaced="yes" lightbox="no"][/col][/columnsection]
